juzs.text: Do ne argue popol de scripture (Jud Christians Muslims) nicest possible manier! - unless ili transgress - Dir Ni kred en ki revealed us en ki revealed vi our di your di est 1 kaj des sam; al Him ni est submitters
Ni revealed vi this scripture those ni ben previous scripture kred en gxi. Ankaux kelk da your popol kred en gxi. Ja those disregard our revelations est efektiv disbelievers
Vi ne leg previous scriptures nor did vi skrib them your man! Tiam rejectors hav raci haven dub
En fakt, these revelations est klar kest de those posed knowledge. Nur wicked vol disregard our revelations
Ili dir nur mirakl ven him his Lord Dir All mirakl ven nur el DI; mi est ne plur than manifest warner
Est gxi ne suficx de mirakl ni send down vi this libr recited them? This est ja mercy reminder popol who kred
Dir DI suffices as witness me vi! Li kon cxio heavens ter. Surely those kred en falsehood disbelieve DI est efektiv losers
Ili challenge vi bring retribution! Se est por predetermined appointment retribution ven them tuj! Certainly gxi ven them suddenly when ili malpli expect gxi
Ili challenge vi bring retribution! Infer jam surrounds disbelievers
Tag ven when retribution overwhelms them el super them beneath their fut; Li dir Gust consequences your works
O My servants kred My ter est spacious tial worship Me
Everyone gust death tiam us vi ultimately returned
Those kred plumb righteous life ni surely sald them Paradise mansions flu streams Eternally ili abide therein. Ki bel rekompenc workers
Ili est unu steadfastly persevere fid their Lord
Many creature ne port its provision DI proviz por gxi tro vi. Li est Hearer Omniscient
Vi pet them Who kre heavens ter put sun lun your service ili dir DI. do gxi tiam ili deviate
DI est UNU increases provision whomever LI chooses His creatures withholds GXI! DI est fully aware da all AJX
Vi pet them Who send cxiel akv revive dead land ili dir DI. Dir Lauxd DI. Plej de them ne kompren
This worldly life est ne plur than vanity lud while abode Hereafter est efektiv life ili nur kon
When ili rajd sxip ili implore DI devoting their prayers Him! as baldaux as Li sav them bord ili revert al idolatry
Let them disbelieve ki ni don them let them gxu temporarily; ili do gxi surely trov out
Ili ne seg ni hav establ Sankt Sanctuary ni far secure while all around them popol est konstant dangxer? Ili ankoraux kred en falsehood Would reject di blessings
Who evil than unu fabricates mensog est atribu them DI rejects truth when gxi ven him? est Infer ne just retribution disbelievers
As por those strive en our kauxz ni surely direkt them our paths! plej assuredly DI est kun des pi
M
Certainly Romans defeated
En cxi land. Post their defeat ili roz re win
Within several jar. Such est di decision ambaux 1 prophecy 2. Ke tag believers gxoj
En di victory. Li grants victory whomever Li vol. Li est Almighty Merciful
Such est di promes - Di neniam romp His promes! - Plej popol ne kon
Ili zorg nur pri ajx this mond est visible al them while est totally oblivious al des Hereafter
Why ili ne reflect themselves? DI NE KRE heavens TER CXIO them SPECIF purpose SPECIF life SXPIN! Tamen plej popol regard meeting their Lord est disbelievers

Ili ne roamed ter not consequences those preceded them? Ili uz est powerful prosperous productive ter. Their messengers ir them klar sign. Consequently DI est Unu wronged them; ili est unu wronged their own anim
consequences por those committed evil est evil Ke because ili rejected di revelations ridiculed them
DI EST UNU INICIAT creation RIPET GXI! Ultimately vi returned Him
Tag when Hor ven pas kulp vol shocked
Their idols ne hav potenc intercede their behalf; sur des contrary ili disown their idols
Tag when Hor ven pas ili part kompani
As por those kred plumb righteous life ili est Paradise gxoj
As por those disbelieve reject our revelations meeting Hereafter ili last retribution forever
Do vi glor DI when vi retire je nokt, when vi roz en des maten
All lauxd est due al Him heavens ter vesper tro as your tag
Li produkt viv dead produkt dead viv Li revives land gxi mort; vi similarly resurrected
Among His proofs est ti Li kre vi polv tiam vi igx reproducing humans
Among His proofs est Li kre vi spouses yourselves en ord hav tranquility contentment each ali Li ej en your kor am zorg your spouses! En this, tie est sufficient proofs popol pens
Among His proofs est creation de heavens ter variations your idiom your kolor. En these tie est sign por des knowledgeable
Among His proofs est your dorm nokt tag your working en pursuit de His provisions En this, tie est sufficient proofs popol auxd
Among His proofs est ti Li montr vi fulm source tim ankaux as esper tiam Li send cxiel akv revive land est dead En these tie est sufficient proofs popol kompren
Among His proofs est ti heaven ter star His disposal! Finally when Li vok vi ter 1 vok vi tuj ven
Al Him aparten everyone heavens ter; all est subservient al Him
Kaj Li est Unu iniciat creation tiam ripet gxi; this est eben facil por Him. Al Him aparten plej sublime similitude heavens ter Li est Almighty Sagx

Li cites vi herein ekzempl el yourselves vi ever elevate your servants Do subordinates nivel kie ili rival vi pint ke vi pag them mult allegiance as est pag al vi? Ni tiel eksplik revelations popol kompren
Ja transgressors sekv their own opinions knowledge. Who tiam direkt those send astray DI? Ne 1 ever help them
Do vi devote religi strict monotheism. Such est natural instinkt ej into popol DI. Such creation de DI testament neniam sxangx. This est perfekt religi plej popol ne kon
Vi submit Him reverence Him observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) kaj! - whatever vi do - ever ne fal idol worship
Ne fal idol worship like those divid their religi sects; each parti gxoj kun ki ili hav
When adversity aflikt popol ili turn al their Lord totally devoting Him. Sed tiam as baldaux as Li dusx them kun mercy, kelk da them revert idol worship
Let them est unappreciative de ki ni don them! Gxu temporarily; vi do gxi surely trov out
Ni don them authorization hav justifies their idolatry
When ni bestow mercy popol ili gxoj therein. when adversity befalls them consequence their own works ili igx despondent
Ili ne realize ti DI Do increases provision whomever Li vol redukt gxi? These est lecion popol kred
(Do vi don relativ their rightful akci charity) tro poor vojagx alien This est put those sincerely streb di plezur; ili est winners
usury practiced increase kelk popol wealth ne gajn anything DI! Se vi don charity streb di plezur, these est unu ricev their rekompenc manifold
DI EST UNU KRE VI. Li est Unu proviz por vi. Li est Unu puts vi death. Li est Unu resurrects vi. any da your idols do any da these ajx? Li glor. Li est mult tro exalted hav any partners
Disasters stern land mar ki popol committed Li tiel lets them gust consequences de kelk da their works ili return (al des tuj works)
Dir Roam ter not consequences those antaux vi. Plej de them est idol worshipers
Do vi devote completely this perfekt religi tag ven which far inevitable DI! Ke tag ili shocked
Whoever disbelieves disbelieves detriment his own anim while those plumb righteous life do tial strengthen develop their own anim
Li generously recompense those kred plumb righteous life el His bounties! Li ne am disbelievers
(Among His proofs est ti Li send vent bon omen dusx vi kun His mercy allow sxip kur mar en accordance kun His regul kaj vi streb His bounties commerce) vi est appreciative
Ni send messengers vi their popol profound sign. Subsequently ni pun those transgressed est our duty ni grant victory believers
DI EST UNU SEND VUND EMOCI NUB STERN CXIEL en accordance kun His VOL! Li tiam piles nub tiam vi seg pluv ven therefrom When gxi auxtun whomever Li chooses His servants ili gxoj
Gxi fal them ili resorted despair
Vi sxat di continuous mercy kaj kiel Li revives land est dead Li do gxi just as certainly resurrect dead Li est Omnipotent
Hav ni send them instead flav sandstorm ili ad disbelieve
Vi ne far dead nor surd auxd vok once ili turn
Nor can vi direkt blind their straying Vi nur auxd those kred en our revelations decid igx submitters
DI EST UNU KRE VI weak TIAM granted VI POST weakness strength TIAM substituted strength weakness GRIZ HAR! Li kre whatever Li vol. Li est Omniscient Omnipotent
(Tag when Hor ven pas kulp vol jxur ili last en this mond) nur unu hor! Est kiel wrong ili est
Those ben knowledge faith dir Vi last di dekret Tag Resurrection! tuj this est Tag Resurrection vi failed recognize gxi
Do ne apology ke tag benefit transgressors nor vol ili pretekst
Tiel ni cited popol en this Quran all kinds da ekzempl. ne materi ki kind da proof vi prezent disbelievers ili dir Vi est falsifiers
DI TIEL SIGEL KOR DE those NE KON
Do vi steadfastly persevere - Por di promes est truth - Kaj ne intimidated per those ne ating certainty
M
These (liter) constitute proofs this libr wisdom
beacon mercy por des righteous
Who observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) don obligatory charity (Zakat) kaj regards Hereafter ili est absolutely nepr
Ili sekv guidance their Lord ili est winners
Among des popol, tie est those uphold baseless Hadith tiel divert others path de DI knowledge pren gxi en vain These incurred shameful retribution
Kaj when our revelations recited 1 de them li turn arrogance as li neniam auxd them his orel est surd. Promes him painful retribution
Surely those kred plumb righteous life ind gxarden bliss
Eternally ili abide therein. This est truthful promes DI. Li est Almighty Sagx
Li kre heavens sen pillars ti vi seg! Li establ ter stabilizers (mont) lest gxi tumbles vi Li stern gxi all kinds da creatures! Ni send cxiel akv kresk all kinds da bel plant
Such est creation DI; montr me ki idols vi set Him kre. Ja transgressors est far astray
Ni dot Luqmaan kun wisdom Vi est appreciative de DI Whoever est appreciative est appreciative por his own bon As por those turn unappreciative DI est ne bezon Praiseworthy
Recall Luqmaan dir al his fil as li enlightened him O my fil do ne set any idols DI; idolatry est gross injustice
(Ni enjoined human est honor his parents His mother bor him load got heavier heavier Gxi pren 2 jar intensive zorg) weaning Vi est appreciative de Me your parents Al Me est ultimate destiny
Ili pen force vi set any idols Me ne obe them! Ad trakt them amicably en this mond! Vi sekv nur path de those submitted Me Ultimately vi all return Me tiam mi inform vi de cxio vi done
O my fil kon ke eben io as tiny as mustard seed profund inside rok est gxi heavens ter DI testament bring gxi. DI EST Sublime Cognizant
O my fil vi observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat). Vi advokat righteousness forbid evil ceter steadfast en des vizagx de adversity! These est plej honorable trajt
Vi ne trakt popol arrogance nor shall vi roam ter proudly. DI NE does arrogant showoffs
Marsx humbly lower your vocx - Turp vocx est donkey's vocx
Do vi ne seg DI committed en your service cxio heavens ter dusx vi His blessings! - obvious fel kelk popol argue pri DI knowledge guidance enlightening scripture
When ili told Sekv these revelations DI ili dir Neni ni sekv nur ki ni trov our parents Ki diabl doing plumb them agondi Infer
Those submit completely DI while konduk righteous life gotten ten de fort obligaci! Por DI est plen control all ajx
As por those disbelieve ne saddened their disbelief! Al us est their ultimate return tiam ni inform them de cxio ili done DI est fully aware da innermost thoughts
Ni let them gxu temporarily tiam commit them severe retribution
Vi pet them Who kre heavens ter ili dir DI. Dir Lauxd est al DI. plej de them ne kon
Al DI aparten cxio heavens ter! DI est PLEJ RICX Praiseworthy
all arb ter far into plum ocean supplied ink eg 7 plur ocean vort DI ne kur out! DI est Almighty SAGX
creation resurrection de all da vi est sam as ke de 1 ul. DI est Hearer Seer
Vi ne realize ti DI merges nokt tag Do merges tag into nokt ke Li committed sun lun your service each kur en its orbit specif life sxpin ke DI est fully Cognizant de cxio vi do
This pruv ti DI est truth while any idol ili set Him est falsehood kaj ti DI est plej Alt Great
Vi ne seg sxip roam mar port di Do provisions montr vi kelk da His proofs Ja these est sufficient proofs everyone est steadfast appreciative

When violent ond surround them ili implore DI sincerely devoting their prayers Him sol! as baldaux as Li sav them bord kelk da them revert Neniom discards our revelations those est betrayers unappreciative
O popol vi reverence your Lord tim tag when patr ne help his own infan nor can infan help his patr! Certainly di promes est truth. Do ne distr this life; ne distr DI mere iluzi
(Kun DI est knowledge Hor end mond). Li est 1 who send down pluv Li kon
kontent womb! Ne anim kon ki vol okaz gxi morgaux ne 1 kon which land li sxi mort! DI est Omniscient Cognizant . . [32:1] A. L. M
Libr est dub revelation Lord univers
Ili dir Li fabricated gxi. Ja this est truth your Lord avert popol who neniam ricev warner vi ili direkt
DI EST UNU KRE heavens TER CXIO them 6 TAG TIAM assumed all AUXTORITAT. Vi hav neniom Him as Lord nor do vi hav intercessor! Vi ne pren heed
All materi controlled Him heaven ter! Al Him tag est ekvivalent al 1000 de your jar
Knower de all sekret declarations; Almighty Merciful
Li est Unu perfekt cxio Li kre started creation human el clay
Tiam Li ad his reproduction nepr lowly liquid
Li shaped him blov him His spirit Li don vi auxd eyesight cerb; rarely est vi thankful
Ili wonder Post ni vanish ter do ni kre re? Do as regards meeting their Lord ili est disbelievers
Dir Vi put death angxel whose charge vi ej tiam your Lord vi returned
Nur vi seg kulp when ili bow their kap their Lord Our Lord tuj ni seg ni auxd. send us ni est righteous! Nun ni ating certainty
Hav ni willed ni don cxiu anim its guidance gxi jam predetermined mi fill Infer jinns humans all together
Gust consequences de your forges this tag; tuj ni forges vi. Vi incurred etern retribution dors your own works
Nur popol ver kred en our revelations est those fal prostrate upon auxd them! Ili glor lauxd their Lord any arrogance
Their flank readily forsake their bed en ord worship their Lord reverence kaj esper kaj our provisions them ili don
Vi ne hav ide kiel mult joy happiness waiting vi as rekompenc your (righteous) works
Unu est believer sam as unu est est wicked? Ili est egal
As por those kred plumb righteous life ili ind etern Paradise! Such est their abode dors their works
As por wicked their destiny est Infer. Cxiu temp ili pen las gxi ili forced dors! Ili told Gust agondi Infer vi uz disbelieve en
(Ni let them gust smaller retribution this mond) antaux ili incur greater retribution Hereafter ke ili (pren hint reform)
Who evil than unu est reminded de these revelations his Lord tiam insist disregarding them? Ni certainly pun kulp
Ni don Moses scripture - Ne haven any dub meeting Him! - Ni far gxi direkt Infan Israel
Ni appointed them imams direkt en accordance kun our commandments ili steadfastly persevered ating certainty our revelations
Your Lord est Unu jugx them Tag Resurrection cxio ili disput
Gxi Does ever occur them kiel many generaci ni annihilated them? Ili tuj viv marsx en their ancestors' hejm. This proviz sufficient proofs Ili ne auxd
Ili ne realize ni driv akv barren land, produkt gxi crops feed their livestock tro themselves? Ili ne seg
Ili challenge Kie ke victory vi est est truthful
Dir tag such victory ven kred vol ne benefit those ne kred antaux ke, nor vol ili don another sxanc
Do disregard them wait ili tro waiting
O vi prophet vi reverence DI ne obe disbelievers hypocrites. DI est Omniscient SAGX
Sekv ki revealed vi your Lord DI est fully Cognizant DE CXIO VI all do
put your fid DI! DI suffices ADVOKAT

(DI NE DON any HOM 2 KOR his KEST. Nor did Li torn your wives whom vi estrange your mor) your mothers Nor did Li torn your adopted infan into genetic offspring All these est mere utterances vi invent. DI PAROL truth LI DIREKT (DEKSTR) path

Vi don your adopted infan nom ke konfit their relationship their genetic parents This est equitable sight DI. Se vi ne kon their parents tiam your brethren religi vi trakt them members your famili. Vi ne commit pek vi far mistake en this respekt; vi est responsible por your purposeful intentions DI est Forgiver Merciful

prophet est closer al believers than ili est al each ali his wives est mothers them. Relativ sorb zorg da unu another en accordance kun di scripture. Tiel believers sorb zorg da their relativ immigrate them proviz ili hav sorb zorg da their own famili 1! These est commandments this scripture
(Recall ti ni pren prophets their covenant vi O Muhammad) Noah Abraham Moses Jesus fil Mary! Ni pren them solen pledge
(Subsequently Li surely question truthful pri their truthfulness prepar disbelievers en this Quranic fakt) painful retribution
O vi kred memor di ben vi; when soldat atak vi ni send them violent vent invisible soldat! DI est Seer DE CXIO VI do
When ili ven el super vi el beneath vi your okul terrified your kor kur pacienc kaj Vi harbored unbefitting thoughts DI
Ke est when believers ver tested ili severely sxancel up
hypocrites those dub their kor dir Ki DI His messenger promes us est ne plur than iluzi
Grup de them dir O popol Yathrib vi ne ating victory; ir Others far up pretekst prophet Our hejm est vulnerable when ili ne est vulnerable. Ili just wanted flee
Hav enemy invad pet them join ili joined enemy sen hesitation
Ili pledged DI en des preter ili ne turn around flee; far pledge DI involves great responsibility
Dir Se vi flee vi neniam flee death el killed Ne materi ki okaz vi nur viv short while long
Dir Who protekt vi DI se Li willed any adversity willed any ben vi? Ili neniam trov DI any ali Lord Mastr
DI EST fully aware da hinderers VI those dir al their KAMARAD all REST Rarely do ILI mobilize POR defense

Ankaux ili est tro stingy when dealing kun vi! Se anything minac community vi vid their okul volv kun tim as death jam ven them! Once kriz est ili vip vi akr lang. Ili est tro stingy their wealth. These est believers consequently DI nullified their works This est facil DI do
Ili opini parti ven Tiam ili wish ili perd dezert pet pri your news el afar! Hav parti atak vi while ili est vi ili rarely support vi
messenger DI set bon ekzempl those among vi streb DI Last Tag constantly pens DI
When prav believers seg parti (pret atak) ili dir This est ki DI His messenger promes us DI His messenger est truthful. This (dangerous situaci) nur strengthened their faith eg their submission
Among believers tie est popol fulfill their pledges DI. Kelk da them mort while others star pret neniam wavering
DI testament surely recompense truthful POR their truthfulness PUN hypocrites SE LI VOL redeem them! DI est Forgiver Merciful
DI repulsed those disbelieved their rage ILI LAS empty-handed! DI TIEL SXPAR believers any batal DI est Powerful Almighty
Li ankaux brought their allies among des popol scripture their secure pozici jxet terror into their kor! Kelk da them vi killed kelk vi sorb captive
Li far vi hered their land their hejm their mon land vi neniam sxtup sur! DI est PLEN control all AJX
O prophet dir al your wives vi streb this life its vanities tiam let me kompens vi allow vi ir amicably
Se vi streb DI His messenger abode Hereafter tiam DI prepar righteous vi great recompense
O wives prophet se any da vi commits gross pek retribution doubled her! This est facil DI do
